title: Clovis Goods 20S1001-60BN, 57-60W x 76H Inch Double Sliding Frameless Shower Door with Clear Glass, Color Brushed Nickel (NEW)
item_description:
Clovis Goods 20S1001-60BN, 57-60W x 76H Inch Double Sliding Frameless Shower Door with Clear Glass, Color Brushed Nickel (NEW)

Condition: NEW
Model Size: 57-60W x 76H Inch
Door Walk-in: 31 1/8 Inch
Double Sliding Design - Flexible double sliding shower door with 2 handles will provide you with a more convenient experience
This shower door can be trimmed up for width adjustment
All the 304-series stainless steel hardware in deluxe quality can resist corrosion and tarnish and will not rust, chip, or scratch off
With a single water deflector and high transparent PVC waterproof strip, it can prevent water from splashing out. Also, the waterproof strip can provide good water tightness and reduce crashes
Solid stainless steel rollers allow smooth, easy, and quiet sliding
Specifications:
Material: Glass and Stainless Steel
Shape: Rectangle
Glass Thickness 3/8 Inch
Number of Handles: 2
Weight: 187 lbs
Dimensions:
Width: 57 - 60 Inch
Height: 76 Inch
Walk Through Opening Width: 31 1/8 Inch
Photo Gallery Note: Representative photos were used for this lot.
